recipe.title: Spinach and Celery Salad with Lemon Vinaigrette
ingredients: 4 large celery stalks, very thinly sliced on diagonal
6 ounces baby spinach leaves (about 10 cups loosely packed)
3 tablespoons fresh Meyer lemon juice or regular lemon juice
instructions: Combine celery and spinach in large bowl. Drizzle olive oil and lemon juice over; sprinkle generously with salt and pepper and toss to coat. Divide among 6 plates. Top each with 2 Asiago-Pepper Frico.
